question: A particle of mass 500 g is at rest. It is free to move along a straight line. The power delivered to the particle varies with time according to the following graph. The momentum of the particle at <katex>$t=5$</katex> s is

explanation: Work done = Area under P-t graph = Area of trapezium = <katex>$\frac{1}{2}(2+8) \times 5 = 25$</katex> J.
Work-Energy theorem: <katex>$\Delta K = W = 25$</katex> J. Initial K=0, so <katex>$K_f = 25$</katex>.
